summary: Implements the response layer for the Moto CloudFront mock service, constructing XML payloads, parsing incoming requests, and delegating to the inâ€‘memory CloudFront backend to perform create, read, update, delete and list operations for distributions, invalidations, key groups, origin access controls, public keys and related resources.
business_intent: Provides a fully functional mock of the AWS CloudFront API so that applications can be tested against CloudFront behavior without contacting the real AWS service.
